Leading in the
‘New Normal’



To lead your team during this unique and challenging time, it is key to communicate clearly, ease heightened emotions, and adjust to leading and working remotely. Check out these quick access resources from HMM that can offer you support in minutes:
Leading Like a Swan: Leaders who act panicky can trigger panic in their team. To project calm, think of yourself as a swan—gliding on the water, while your feet paddle fast below the surface, unseen by your team.

Build Your Emotional Agility: Take a moment to check-in with your own emotions and processing so that you can build emotional agility within yourself and your team.

How to Build Trust on Your Virtual Team: Teams don’t work unless members trust each other—and building trust is especially hard in a virtual team. Four tactics can help, including fostering predictable communication and encouraging members to share power.
Lead Your Business Through the Coronavirus Crisis: Twelve lessons on analyzing data, communicating information, and protecting your team members.

Emotional Agility: Get “unhooked” from negative thoughts and emotions.

Five Tips for Better Virtual Meetings: Virtual meetings require different skills than face-to-face gatherings. Learn techniques to make yours more engaging.
Lead Your Business Through the Coronavirus Crisis: Twelve lessons on analyzing data, communicating information, and protecting your team members.

Emotional Agility: Get “unhooked” from negative thoughts and emotions.

Five Tips for Better Virtual Meetings: Virtual meetings require different skills than face-to-face gatherings. Learn techniques to make yours more engaging.
Worksheet for Identifying Resources: Use this worksheet to identify and arrange for availability of resources in response to business impacts due to the pandemic.

A 3-Step Calm-Down: When you need to regain calm, try this three-step process.

Structuring Your Day: Your work day might look very different in this “new normal.” Use this worksheet to put together an effective plan for your working from home structure.
Interested in discussing any of these topics over a peer-to-peer coffee chat? Email us at trianglelearningacademy@cantire.com and we’ll reach out to you with any future social learning opportunities.
For additional resources, check out the following topics on HMM:

Crisis Management, Leading People, Stress Management, Team Management, Meeting Management, Global Collaboration, and Change Management.
